summary: Fit a machine learning model to training data
description: Trains a specified model using the provided training data and target dimension, applying it to recognize patterns in the data.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A pre-defined model to be trained, such as one created by `ml_class_random_forest`.

parameters.name: training_set
parameters.description: Training data for the model, provided as a vector data cube that includes both independent variables and the target variable.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Name of the dimension in the training set that represents the dependent variable.

returns.description: A trained model object that can be saved or used for making predictions.
